attributes.action: Ban looped cord blinds in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign the petition to raise the awareness and dangers in the homes of young children and to cease the manufacture of loop corded blinds which cause fatalities in children around the world. 

The manufacture of this type of blind was banned in America following the death of nearly 400 children in the USA in only a few years. 

This is what Harrisons Law wants to achieve worldwide in order to prevent other parents facing the anguish of losing a child this way.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban looped cord blinds in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22850


Prime Minister's Office
